follio_list.title: Rightboat
follio_list.description: Rightboat is a website dedicated to connecting boat buyers with boat sellers around the world. The website offers a wide range of new and used boats for sale, as well as a variety of other services related to the boating industry. Users can search for boats based on various criteria such as make, model, price range, and location. The website also provides helpful resources and information for boat buyers and sellers, including financing options, insurance, and maintenance tips.

follio_list.title: Darscrubs
follio_list.description: Darscrubs is the leading supplier of high-quality medical scrubs to doctors, nurses, and other medical professionals associated with the healthcare sector. For years, Darscrubs has been assisting healthcare centers in offering the first-rate safety and professional treatment that their patients need. The company is also the leading supplier of professionally crafted medical uniforms and other accessories. Their aim is to ensure that every medical practitioner has high-quality medical scrubs that allow him/her to better serve their patients through A-grade healthcare.
